channel.title: Client Handler Disconnection Problems
channel.description:
My Players are Connecting, and There Connection is Getting Accepted But straight after they Connect, they either have:
A weird Username like - fbfbdrgvrgd34r And there invisible
or
It will disconnect them and say this: Here is one of my friends for example, Skiller99
[code]Game saved for player Skiller99 ClientHandler: Client Skiller99 disconnected.[/code]

item.title: Client Handler Disconnection Problems
item.dc:creator: @AllStarUltimate AllStarUltimate
item.description:
@AllStarUltimate wrote:

My Players are Connecting, and There Connection is Getting Accepted
But straight after they Connect, they either have:

A weird Username like - fbfbdrgvrgd34r
And there invisible

or

It will disconnect them and say this:
Here is one of my friends for example, Skiller99

Game saved for player Skiller99 ClientHandler: Client Skiller99 disconnected.

Read full topic
